name: Serious Chocolate: Hot Cocoa
description: [Photograph: Robyn Lee] Tired of the normal kind? Try adding a dash of cayenne, pumpkin pie spice (mmm), ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, and crushed candy canes. My apartment is so cold that I've started wearing fingerless gloves in the shower. I...
recipeYield: about 5 cups of dry cocoa mix

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl. Pour a heaping amount of this mixture into a mug. Cover with hot water and stir.
A dash of cayenne (for a Mexican cocoa kick); pumpkin pie spice (mmm); ginger; nutmeg; cinnamon; and crushed candy canes (to make good use of those leftover Christmas treats.)
